pr_title: [CDAP-16353] Add scaling factor to adjust resource size for KubeTwill program

timeline.message: Add cpu scaling factor for KubeTwillPreparer.

(CDAP-16353) Refactor KubeTwillPreparer k8s deployment building into its own function

What:
Refactor the k8s deployment object building into a separate function
with all external data required passed in via parameters.

Why:
Allow us to write a unit test for this function to verify the state of
deployment k8s object is as expectd.

timeline.bodyText: How about adding "resource" to the name, e.g. kubeResourceScalingFactors
timeline.author: wyzhang

replies.bodyText:
Would it be simpler to keep a pointer to conf in KubeTwillRunnerService and KubeTwillPreparer?
Then you would need to add const string for the keys
kubernetes.request.memory.multiplier and kubernetes.request.cpu.multiplier to
io.cdap.cdap.common.conf.Constants
Set the default value in
cdap-common/src/main/resources/cdap-default.xml

timeline.bodyText: Why need to copy the config? You can pass the whole conf object to the runner service. In future there could be other configurations being added.
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: Does Quantity takes floating point value? Should we round it up/down?
timeline.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText:
Quantity converts the string number to BigDecimal so can be float. Ref: https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/blob/master/kubernetes/src/main/java/io/kubernetes/client/custom/Quantity.java#L17
The default value of vCores is 1. Rounding up or down would remove the scaling effect we want here. Ref: https://github.com/apache/twill/blob/master/twill-api/src/main/java/org/apache/twill/api/ResourceSpecification.java#L28
